name: Dice of destiny (o.diukov)
description:
* Idea

MTG (Maybe The Game) in the diceverse =)

Turn-based combat with various monsters on the endless arena

where dice roll your only hope.

* UI

The bottom part left to right:

1. Player's HP and Icon.

2. Player's "body" parts (monster will attack there).

3. Player's attack dices.

The upper part left to right:

1. Monster's HP and Icon.

2. Monster's "body" parts (you should attack here).

3. Book Icon: click here to see a list of spells.

4. Ready Button: click here to start the fight.

* Control

Click on one of the Player's dices and then you can:

1. Click on the monster's "body" part to plan an attack.

2. Click on the player's "body" part to plan a defense.

After that click on the "Ready" button to see the outcome of this turn of the battle.
